title: More ways to work with your team and tools in ChatGPT
optimized_headline: "Discover 5 Innovative Ways to Collaborate with Your Team Using ChatGPT"
raw_excerpt: ChatGPT business plans now support shared projects, smarter connectors, and enhanced compliance features to help teams work faster and more securely.
raw_body: ChatGPT business plans now support shared projects, smarter connectors, and enhanced compliance features to help teams work faster and more securely.
speedrun: ChatGPT has rolled out new features for its business plans, including shared projects, smarter connectors, and improved compliance tools. These enhancements aim to boost team collaboration and security, allowing members to work more efficiently. With these updates, ChatGPT is positioning itself as a more robust tool for businesses that prioritize teamwork and data protection. This shift is timely as remote work continues to rise and teams seek better ways to connect online.
why_it_matters: Teams using ChatGPT can now collaborate more effectively, sharing projects seamlessly and ensuring compliance with security standards.
These updates reflect a broader trend in the market towards integrated tools that enhance collaboration and security in remote work environments.

lenses.eli12: ChatGPT has introduced features that help teams work together better. Think of it like a digital office where everyone can share ideas and stay secure. These updates matter because they make it easier for people to connect and collaborate, especially when working from different locations.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, these new features address the growing need for efficient team collaboration in a remote work setting. By enhancing project sharing and compliance, ChatGPT could reduce operational risks and improve team productivity. This means teams can focus more on their work without worrying about security issues.
lenses.engineer: The latest updates to ChatGPT's business plans include shared projects and smarter connectors, which streamline team interactions. Enhanced compliance features ensure that data handling meets security standards. These improvements could lead to increased efficiency in workflows, making ChatGPT a more competitive option for businesses focused on secure collaboration.
